title: Leisure Suit Larry - Magna Cum Laude Uncut and Uncensored
notes: The game is very laggy and impossible to play.

title: Leisure Suit Larry - Magna Cum Laude Uncut and Uncensored
notes: Almost the entire game is laggy to the point of being completely unplayable; the exception to this is when walking around in the in-game world, which works fine - except that the sound does not work; at all other times (during animations or menus, etc...), the sound works, but it is completely distorted.
